00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;

00032 /*! Constructor
00033  * Default constructor. Initializes all variables to 0 if numeric, "" if string and the date to the current date and time.
00034  */
00035 CalvinException::CalvinException()
00036 {
00037         errorCode = 0;
00038         lineNumber = 0;
00039         fileName = "";
00040         timeStamp = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00041         errorDescription = L"";
00042         sourceName = L"";                       
00043 }
00044 
00045 /*! Constructor
00046  * Constructs a CalvinException object.
00047  *
00048  * @param _Source Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
00049  * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00050  * @param _TimeStamp Time and date the exception occured.
00051  * @param _FileName File name of the source file the exception occured. The __FILE__ can be used to determine this information.
00052  * @param _LineNumber Line number in the source file that generated the exception. The __LINE__ can be used to determine this information.
00053  * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00054  */
00055 CalvinException::CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, std::wstring _TimeStamp, std::string _FileName, u_int16_t _LineNumber, u_int64_t _ErrorCode)
00056 {
00057         Source(_Source);
00058         Description(_Description);
00059         LineNumber(_LineNumber);
00060         SourceFile(_FileName);
00061         TimeStamp(_TimeStamp);
00062         ErrorCode(_ErrorCode);
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*! Constructor
00066  * Constructs a CalvinException object
00067  * Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.
00068  *
00069  * @param _Source Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
00070  * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00071  * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00072  */
00073 CalvinException::CalvinException(std::wstring _Source, std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode)
00074 {
00075         Source(_Source);
00076         Description(_Description);
00077         LineNumber(0);
00078         SourceFile("");
00079         TimeStamp(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00080         ErrorCode(_ErrorCode);
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*! Constructor
00084  * Constructs a CalvinException object
00085  * Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.
00086  *
00087  * @param _Description A brief message which describes what happened.
00088  * @param _ErrorCode An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
00089  */
00090 CalvinException::CalvinException(std::wstring _Description, u_int64_t _ErrorCode)
00091 {
00092         Source(L"");
00093         Description(_Description);
00094         LineNumber(0);
00095         SourceFile("");
00096         TimeStamp(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00097         ErrorCode(_ErrorCode);
00098 }

00221 const std::wstring CalvinException::ToString()

00223         std::wstring fullMsg;

00226         
00227         return fullMsg;

00231 /*! Format source file, line and time stamp.
00232  *
00233  * @return Returns a string combining source file, line number and time stamp.
00234  */
00235 std::wstring CalvinException::SystemInfo()
00236 { 
00237   std::wstring systemInfo;
00238 
00239   // TIME STAMP
00240   if ( !timeStamp.empty() ) {
00241     systemInfo = timeStamp;
00242   }
00243   
00244   // FILE NAME
00245   if ( !fileName.empty() ) {
00246     std::wstring wfileName( fileName.length(), L' ' );
00247     std::copy(fileName.begin(), fileName.end(), wfileName.begin());
00248     if( systemInfo.empty() ) {
00249       systemInfo = wfileName;
00250     }
00251     else {
00252       systemInfo = systemInfo + L":" + wfileName;
00253     }
00254   }
00255   // LINE NUMBER
00256   if ( lineNumber ) {
00257     std::wostringstream line;
00258     line << lineNumber;
00259     if( systemInfo.empty() ) {
00260       systemInfo = line.str();
00261     }
00262     else {
00263       systemInfo = systemInfo + L":" + line.str();
00264     }
00265   }
00266   if ( !systemInfo.empty() ) {
00267     systemInfo = systemInfo + L":";
00268   }
00269 
00270   return systemInfo;
00271 }
